name: grocery-price-finder
description: A web application to compare grocery prices across nearby stores

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=backend && npm install --workspace=frontend && npm install --workspace=@grocery-price-finder/types
scripts.build:all: npm run build:types && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=backend && npm run type-check --workspace=@grocery-price-finder/types
